attributes.action: Create an accountable Football Association so fans have control over our national game
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I suggest that the government create a member led Football Association.  

The new people's FA will have charity status.  It will be owned by its share holders - the FA members - who can become a member for £100.  Each member will have voting rights to appoint the FA board and the new England manager.  Only by creating a democratic, fan owned, FA, can we save our national game from humilation, corporate greed and salvage some pride back for England's national football team.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
